name: Crystal Sea
description:
Crystal Sea is a casual, story driven RPG in which player choices can affect the plot and Synthesis can create new items. Full of your favorite JRPG tropes with a usonian twist, you play as Libra Spectre, an ex-healer in the Imperial Army. Uncover the true consequences of your journey with romance, humor, and mystery as you cross paths with other fateful companions.

Credits:

Megan Johnston: story, characters, gameplay
Tori Veitenheimer: character art

Joshua Johnston: select music

Ethan Freese: alpha-omega tester

Alchemy and Smithing by Tidloc

Portrait Messages by Galv

Gab Messages by Yanfly

Side Battle View by Jet

Vehicle Battle by SoulPour777
